      参数类型为IThreadListener的net.minecraft.network中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static <T extends INetHandler>
      void      		 PacketThreadUtil.checkThreadAndEnqueue​(Packet<T> packetIn, T processor, IThreadListener scheduler)
      Handles pumping inbound packets across threads by checking whether the current thread is actually the main thread for the side in question.
